name: Ponomarev Denis
title: Front-End Web Developer
prompt: I am a front-end developer with about 4 years of experience in web development. During last years I developed a number of web sites and applications using latest web standarts. This is what I do and what am I like to do.
strong_description: My strongest skills are HTML5, CSS3 and javascript. I prefer to use AngularJS, LESS and MongoDB/NodeJS or frameworks like Angular-Meteor in my applications.
I worked a lot with enchanced HTML5 graphics (presentations, schemes, charts etc). I used RaphaelJS for SVG; EaselJS, KineticJS, FabricJS for CANVAS; ThreeJS for WebGL.

I developed cross-browser and cross-platform web applications, with modern features and and polyfills for old and mobile browsers (Android, iOS, IE8). Expirienced with creating mobile apps packaged through PhoneGap.
weak_description: Before i set priority on Web FrontEnd i mostly worked on Qt. Created Linux/Windows/Android applications.

travel.value: Travelling is my passion, opporunity to travel is always a good point for me

volunteer.value: I`ve been a participant in different youth exchange programs, organized events with foreign volunteers.

fire.value: I like Cycling and climbing. As a member of trickers group I perform with fire-show.
